Message: hey today I had a really busy day at work I am really tired and I don't want to train

I hear your fatigue, it's important to listen to one's body sometimes. But remember, exercise can also recharge us mentally and physically. If you're up for it, let's do a lighter session tailored to your needs, giving your body the rest it craves while still benef
this morning I fell off the stairs so my knee hurts very bad and also I broke one finger of my feet so I will not train

Oh no, accidents can be disheartening, especially when we're eager to train. Your well-being comes first. Take the time to recover properly, and we'll pick up where we left off when you're ready. In the meantime, gentle stretches or physical therapy may help maintain some fitness
sorry I don't have time to train today because I have a date and I can't miss it because its really important to me
Understood, prioritizing personal connections is essential too. Enjoy your special moment, and perhaps we can reschedule a workout for soon after, keeping you energized for future engagements.
